protocol.description: This protocol exposes hyprland-specific wl_surface properties.

interface.name: hyprland_surface_manager_v1
interface.description: This interface allows a client to create hyprland surface objects.

request.name: get_hyprland_surface
request.description:
Create a hyprland surface object for the given wayland surface.
If the wl_surface already has an associated hyprland_surface_v1 object, even from a different manager, creation is a protocol error.

request.name: destroy
request.description: Destroy the surface manager. This does not destroy existing surface objects.

entry.name: already_constructed
entry.summary: wl_surface already has a hyprland surface object

interface.name: hyprland_surface_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows access to hyprland-specific properties of a wl_surface.
Once the wl_surface has been destroyed, the hyprland surface object must be destroyed as well. All other operations are a protocol error.

request.name: set_opacity

description.summary: set the overall opacity of the surface

request.description:
Sets a multiplier for the overall opacity of the surface. This multiplier applies to visual effects such as blur behind the surface in addition to the surface's content.
The default value is 1.0. Setting a value outside of the range 0.0 - 1.0 (inclusive) is a protocol error. Does not take effect until wl_surface.commit is called.

request.name: destroy
request.description: Destroy the hyprland surface object, resetting properties provided by this interface to their default values on the next wl_surface.commit.

entry.name: out_of_range
entry.summary: given opacity was not in the range 0.0 - 1.0 (inclusive)
